channel.title: cmd on Banbanzai
channel.description: Recent content in cmd on Banbanzai

item.title: vbs and cmd
item.description: Set ws = CreateObject("Wscript.Shell") Dim path path = "path with space is ok" ws.CurrentDirectory = path Dim cmd cmd = "cmd /c a.exe -p > output.txt 2>&1" r = ws.Run(cmd,0,false) REM Wscript.Echo r cmd /k 执行后保持 cmd /c 执行后关闭
